topics.body:
Do you ever have one of those moments where you just hear what someone is saying and you can hear your brains slowly liquifying and you're worried that you have to plug your ears else they fall out?

Basically I was talking to someone about ectogenesis; I've talked about it a couple times before, but basically what it is that scientists are working on artificial uteruses so that women that can't have kids or that people that have stds can have kids with the baby essentially going through the nine months in a artificial uterus outside the body.  So anyways the part that made my brain partially liquify was that the person I was talking to said outright, "good that means we'll be able to criminalize sex".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547672556368721e061f0000#post_547672556368721e061f0000
Tl:dr; I was talking to someone about ectogenesis, basically a new technology that is being worked on for babies to be in artificial uteruses so that women with stds and such can still have children without passing on the disease to them and the response I got from someone I know is that as a result they thought it would be a great idea to criminalize sex since the technology is probably going to come out in less than ten years.  I then made a joke about how that person's stupidity was liquifying my brain into tang which then turned into a evangelion joke about how at the end of evangelion they turned into tang.
